solution_line_template: The dog's total weight is {total_dog_weight} because {dog_weight_1}+{dog_weight_2}+{dog_weight_3}+{dog_weight_4}+{dog_weight_5}=<<{dog_weight_1}+{dog_weight_2}+{dog_weight_3}+{dog_weight_4}+{dog_weight_5}={total_dog_weight}>>{total_dog_weight}
They need {daily_food_needed} pounds a day because {total_dog_weight}/{weight_per_pound_food}=<<{total_dog_weight}/{weight_per_pound_food}={daily_food_needed}>>{daily_food_needed}
